Parameters: MediaSync: The MediaSync object. This value must never be null.
ByteBuffer: The returned audio buffer. This value must never be null.
int: The ID associated with audioBuffer as passed into @B_android#media#MediaSync#queueAudio_E@.
onAudioBufferConsumed(android.media.Medi.Description: Called when returning an audio buffer which has been consumed.
onAudioBufferConsumed(android.media.Medi.FullName: public abstract void onAudioBufferConsumed (MediaSync sync, ByteBuffer audioBuffer, int bufferId)

ClassDesc: MediaSync callback interface. Used to notify the user asynchronously of various MediaSync events.
